int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d
" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { int n ; scanf ( "%d
" , & n ) ; int a [ n ] , i ; long long int c = 1 , k = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d " , & a [ i ] ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < ( n - 1 ) ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] <= a [ i + 1 ] ) c ++ ; else { k = k + ( ( c * ( c + 1 ) ) / 2 ) ; c = 1 ; } } k = k + ( ( c * ( c + 1 ) ) / 2 ) ; printf ( "%lld
" , k ) ; } return 0 ; }
